tool_description: Optimizes shipping decisions based on business rules, cost constraints, customer preferences, and service level requirements.

customer_preference.description: Customer shipping preference: fastest, cheapest, balanced, premium

business_rules.description: Business rules to apply (e.g., free_shipping_threshold, preferred_carriers)

rush_order.description: Whether this is a rush order requiring expedited shipping

insurance_required.description: Whether insurance is required for this shipment

eco_friendly_preference.description: Whether to prefer eco-friendly shipping options

error_messages: Invalid comparison results: Comparison results identifier not found
Invalid customer preference: Must be 'fastest', 'cheapest', 'balanced', or 'premium'
Invalid business rules format: Business rules must be valid rule identifiers
Invalid order value: Order value must be a positive number
Invalid customer tier: Must be 'standard', 'premium', or 'vip'
Optimization failed: Unable to find suitable shipping option meeting all criteria
usage: Provide comparison_results, customer_preference, business_rules array, and order_value. Configure additional parameters for advanced optimization. Returns optimized shipping recommendation.

optimization_score.description: Optimization score (0-100) indicating how well recommendation meets criteria

cost_savings.description: Estimated cost savings compared to default option

applied_rules.description: Business rules that were applied in optimization

alternative_options.description: Alternative shipping options ranked by suitability
